overview: The title Dalla villa reale di Rjeka (Montenegro) is misleading, as it’s attached to a composite film made up of footage shot in 1910 during King Nikola’s coronation in Cettigne and then jumps ahead two years to the winter capital of Rijeka Crnojevića (now a run-down backwater) during the First Balkan War.
title: From the Royal Villa at Rjeka (Montenegro)
